revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = S1300-5.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = CONVEXA-S OpenWrt Gateway for Smart Home Wireless Devices |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-s1300/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-S1300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (Convexa-S) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 30, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/GL.iNet_GL-S1300 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless system, IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-S1300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4029; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 717 <!-- 717 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;EFR32MG1P232F256GM48-CR0; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,X86, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SK hynix;H26M41204HPR; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E4:95:6E |oui = E4:95:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, SON, Bluetooth 5.1 LE, ZigBee, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GL-S1300-XXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/30/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "GL-S1300_V1.2.2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"D9PXV" Micron [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9PXV FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to the MT41K256M16HA-125:E
:[https://store.gl-inet.com/collections/smart-home-gateway-mesh-router/products/gl-s1300-smart-home-gateway Official Store]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_gl-s1300 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-s1300_v1 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.6 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Also known as Convexa-S. Supports an internal Zigbee or Bluetooth module. Missing DSA Setup since 23.05+ }} Please insert instructions here
